mdRecord.dcterms:title: English ice bag
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Davol Rubber Co. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Made by Davol Rubber Company, Providence, Rhode Island. One 9-inch English Ice Bag, with improved screw cap. Number 439. Bag has engraved: Patented June 1918, March [illegible]. Screw cap has engraved: Pat Aug 1927, Other Pat Pend.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
